name: Dr.Uma Vetri Selvi G
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: - 2024  ( Computer Application )  - 2002Ph.D  ( Computer Science )  - PSG College ofTechnology  - 10/18/2013Supervisor: Dr.R.Nadarajan
in_brief: Dr. G.Uma Vetri Selvi is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences. She completed her full-time Ph.D under the guidance of Dr.R.Nadarajan from the same department of PSG College of Technology. She has qualified SET and NET exam conducted to determine the eligibility for Assistant Professor in Indian Universities and Colleges. She has over 9 years of experience in teaching. Her area of research interests  includes Medical Image Compression, Data Structures and Medical Image Processing. She has published papers in 4 International Journals and 3 International Conference Proceedings.

publications.journal: Physical And Engineering Sciences In Medicine
publications.title: A Rapid Compression Technique for 4-D Functional MRI Images using Data Rearrangement and Modified Binary Array Techniques
CT and MRI Image Compression Using Wavelet Based Contourlet Transform and Binary Array Technique
Coronary Angiogram video Compression using Wavelet based Contourlet Transform and ROI technique

publications.journal: International Journal of Engineering, Transactions A: Basics
publications.title: Application of Contrast Sensitivity Function and Binary Matrix Technique for Medical Image Compression
